survey_name: Customer Preferences for Subscription Streaming Services
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand customer preferences, satisfaction levels, and pain points related to subscription-based streaming services.

questions.question_text: Which subscription streaming services do you currently use?
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow selection of multiple services. Ensure 'Other' has an open-text field for specification.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with checkbox options. Include an open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which subscription streaming services do you currently use?

questions.question_text: How many subscription streaming services do you currently pay for?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format. Ensure the options cover a realistic range.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with radio buttons.

script.question_text: How many subscription streaming services do you currently pay for?

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you subscribe to streaming services?
answer_options: To watch movies/TV shows on demand
